  • Method Details

    • createAccount

      public int createAccount(String handle) throws IllegalHandleException, InvalidHandleException
      Creates a new account with the given handle and returns the user ID of the newly created account.
      Specified by:
      createAccount in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      handle - The handle to be associated with the new account
      Returns:
      The user ID of the newly created account
      Throws:
      IllegalHandleException - if an account with the same handle already exists in the platform
      InvalidHandleException - if the handle is not a single word or contains more than 30 characters

    • removeAccount

      public void removeAccount(int id) throws AccountIDNotRecognisedException
      Removes an account from Accounts-Hashmap using the account's id.
      Specified by:
      removeAccount in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      id - The user ID associated with the account to be removed
      Throws:
      AccountIDNotRecognisedException - if an account with the given ID does not exist in the platform

    • changeAccountHandle

      public void changeAccountHandle(String handle, String new_handle) throws HandleNotRecognisedException
      Changes the handle of an account in the Accounts-Hashmap.
      Specified by:
      changeAccountHandle in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      handle - The current handle of the account
      new_handle - The new handle to be associated with the account
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if an account with the current handle does not exist in the platform

      Shows the details of an account in the Accounts-Hashmap.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      handle - The handle of the account
      Returns:
      the account formatted summary.
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if the handle is not recognized in the Accounts-Hashmap

    • createPost

      public int createPost(String handle, String message) throws HandleNotRecognisedException, InvalidPostException
      Creates a new post for the specified handle with the given message.
      Specified by:
      createPost in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      handle - the handle of the account to create the post for
      message - the message to be included in the post
      Returns:
      the ID of the created post
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if the account with the given handle does not exist
      InvalidPostException - if the message is empty or longer than 100 characters

    • endorsePost

      public int endorsePost(String handle, int postId) throws HandleNotRecognisedException, PostIDNotRecognisedException, NotActionablePostException
      Creates a new repost or endorsement for the specified post and handle.
      Specified by:
      endorsePost in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      handle - the handle of the account making the repost/endorsement
      postId - the ID of the post to be reposted/endorsed
      Returns:
      the ID of the reposted/endorsed post
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if the account with the given handle does not exist
      PostIDNotRecognisedException - if the post with the given ID does not exist
      NotActionablePostException - if the post cannot be endorsed (i.e. it is a comment, not an original post, or has already been endorsed)

    • commentPost

      public int commentPost(String handle, int postId, String message) throws HandleNotRecognisedException, PostIDNotRecognisedException, NotActionablePostException, InvalidPostException
      This method allows a user to make a comment on an original post.
      Specified by:
      commentPost in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      handle - the handle of the user making the comment
      postId - of the post being commented.
      message - the comment message to be posted
      id - the ID of the original post to be commented on
      Returns:
      the ID of the new comment post
      Throws:
      HandleNotRecognisedException - if the handle is not recognised
      PostIDNotRecognisedException - if the post ID is not recognised
      NotActionablePostException - if the post cannot be commented on
      InvalidPostException - if the comment message is invalid

    • deletePost

      public void deletePost(int id) throws PostIDNotRecognisedException
      This method deletes a post by its ID. Firstly, it checks if the ID exists in the posts hashmap. If it does not exist, it throws a PostIDNotRecognisedException. If it exists, it will remove the post from the hashmap with the remove(id).
      Specified by:
      deletePost in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the post to be deleted.
      Throws:
      PostIDNotRecognisedException - if the given post ID is not recognised.

    • showIndividualPost

      public String showIndividualPost(int id) throws PostIDNotRecognisedException
      Returns a String object containing the individual details of the post with the specified ID.
      Specified by:
      showIndividualPost in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the post to get the details of
      Returns:
      a String object containing the individual details of the post
      Throws:
      PostIDNotRecognisedException - if the ID does not match to any post in the system.

    • showPostChildrenDetails

      public StringBuilder showPostChildrenDetails(int id) throws PostIDNotRecognisedException, NotActionablePostException
      Returns a StringBuilder object containing the individual details of the post with its comments.
      Specified by:
      showPostChildrenDetails in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the post to show details for
      Returns:
      a StringBuilder containing the details of the post
      Throws:
      PostIDNotRecognisedException - if the given post ID is not recognised
      NotActionablePostException - if the post cannot be commented on

    • getMostEndorsedPost

      public int getMostEndorsedPost()
      This method is used to retrieve the post with the highest number of endorsements. It loops through all posts in the posts map and updates the postId and endorsement count if a post with a higher endorsement count is found. The postId and endorsement count are then returned by the method.
      Specified by:
      getMostEndorsedPost in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Returns:
      The number of endorsements for the most endorsed post

    • getMostEndorsedAccount

      public int getMostEndorsedAccount()
      This method returns the number of endorsements received by the account with the most endorsements. It loops through all the accounts in the accounts map, updating the endorsement number and account handl variables if the current account has more endorsements than the current highest endorsement count. It then returns the highest endorsement count.
      Specified by:
      getMostEndorsedAccount in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Returns:
      The number of endorsements received by the account with the most endorsements.

    • erasePlatform

      public void erasePlatform()
      This method erases the platform.
      Specified by:
      erasePlatform in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform

    • savePlatform

      public void savePlatform(String filename) throws IOException
      This method saves the platform to a file.
      Specified by:
      savePlatform in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      filename - location of the file to be saved
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is a problem experienced when trying to save the store contents to the file

    • loadPlatform

      public void loadPlatform(String filename) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      This method loads the platform.
      Specified by:
      loadPlatform in interface MiniSocialMediaPlatform
      Parameters:
      filename - location of the file to be loaded
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is a problem experienced when trying to load the store contents from the file
      ClassNotFoundException - if required class files cannot be found when loading
